description.default: 极富现代感的类 macOS 主题，以轻量、极简的风格，带来优雅、高效的笔记体验。ps：新增顶栏、毛玻璃效果等自定义项，详见「主题特性」👇
description.zh_CN: 极富现代感的类 macOS 主题，以轻量、极简的风格，带来优雅、高效的笔记体验。ps：新增顶栏、毛玻璃效果等自定义项，详见「主题特性」👇
description.en_US: An ultra-modern macOS-like theme that offers a lightweight and minimalistic style, providing an elegant and efficient note-taking experience. ps: Added more customizable options regarding top bar, glassmorphism, etc. Please check Theme Features below for details👇
